servinfo.title: Oil Cooler Hose and Pipe Removal and Installation

s1.ptxt: Make sure to wash dirt off from around pipe joints.
With engine is cool, loosen oil cooler pipe union bolts (2) with oil outlet union locked and remove oil cooler pipes (1) from oil outlet unions and hoses.

attention3.ptxt: To avoid fluid leakage, plug open ends of oil outlet unions and hoses right after they are disconnected.

servinfosub.title: Installation
servinfosub.ptxt: When replacing them, be sure to note the followings.

item.ptxt: To replace clamps at the same time
To insert hose as far as its limit mark

s1.ptxt: Use new union gaskets and connect oil cooler pipes to oil outlet unions.
Connect hoses to pipes and clamp them securely.
Tighten union bolts to specified torque with oil outlet union locked referring to Oil Cooler Hose and Pipe Components:4 A/T .
Tighten pipe bolt to specified torque referring to Oil Cooler Hose and Pipe Components:4 A/T .
Check A/T fluid level according to procedure described in A/T Fluid Level Check:4 A/T . Add if necessary.
Check for fluid leakage after warming up A/T.
